archimate:BusinessRole.name: Resolver
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: A software module that accepts an Identifier as input, looks up the Identifier in a database or ledger, and returns metadata describing the identified Entity. The Domain Name System (DNS) uses a DNS resolver. Self-Sovereign Identity uses a DID Resolver.
